The Elder Taraṇiya’s Birth Story

analyzed: attha dassī tu bhagavā  sayambhū loka nāyako
translated: The Fortunate One, the one who sees what is good,
the self-dependent, the leader of the world,
the Realised One came to the bank🔽of the river Vinatā.
Having come out of the water,
like a turtle who goes into the water,
I approached the leader of the world,
desiring to cross the Buddha.
‘May the Buddha, the one who sees what is good,
the great sage, ascend me,
I will cross you,
you who will make an end to suffering.’

analyzed: mama saṅkappam aññāya  attha dassī mahā yaso
translated: Having understood my thought,🔽the one who sees what is good, the one of great fame,
having ascended my back,
the leader of the world stood (there).
Since I have known myself,
since I have attained understanding,
I have no happiness like that,
when the soles of his feet touched me.
Having crossed over, the Sambuddha,
the one who sees what is good, the one of great fame,
having stood on the bank of the river,
recited these verses.
‘As long as my mind is flowing,
I will cross the river Ganges,
and this wise king of turtles
will cross me.
By this crossing of the Buddha,
and the state of loving-kindness.
For eighteen hundred eons
he will delight in the heavenly world.
Having come here from the heavenly world,
urged on by the root of merit,
while sitting in a single session
he will cross the flood of doubt.
Just as in a good field
a small seed sown
if well-tended
will satisfy the farmer with its fruit.
So too this field of the Buddha,
taught by the Fully Enlightened One,
if well-tended
will satisfy me with its fruit.
I am one who has exerted himself,🔽peaceful, without possessions,
having fully understood all the pollutants,
I live without pollutants.
For eighteen hundred eons
the deed I did then
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of crossing over.
My defilements are burned up,
I live without pollutants.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.
The four analytical knowledges,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”
